item.description:
AT THE LEBANON OPERA HOUSE, AN EVENING OF FILMS BY WARREN MILLER OF SKIING EXTREMES.... GETS YOU EXCITED ABOUT THE UP COMING SKI SEASON... AND WANTING IT TO SNOW... COME JOIN ME ON THURSDAY NOVEMBER 10 AT 7:00.. IT STARTS AT 7:30... WE COULD MEET EARLY AT SALT HILL FOR DINNER FOR THOSE WHO WISH TO.... I HAVE IN THE PAST ENJOY THE ENTERTAINMENT THAT HE SHOWS IN HIS FILMS... IT IS FOR ALL TYPES OF SKIERS.. THERE ARE GIVE AWAYS SOMETIMES HALF PRICE SKI TICKETS AT LOCAL SKI AREAS.... DON'T MISS IT .... AND COME JOIN ME.

 

 

$20.00 general admissions

group.name: Lebanon/White River Junction Hiking Meetup Group

item.name: WARREN MILLER ENTERTAINMENT
